article_title: How Durata Plans To Market Its Expensive New Antibiotic

article_metadata.author: Wendy Diller

og.description: FDA’s approval on May 23 of Durata Therapeutics Inc.’s antibiotic Dalvance (dalbavancin) underscores the potential and also the challenges life science companies face in grappling with new payment and delivery reform models, some driven by the Affordable Care Act (ACA), but also independent of it. The drug is indicated for [...]
